# [Interview #1177: La Dimension Fantastique, Entry #5](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1177#5)

#### Question

Also a weird question, has Hoid ever had a romantic interest?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Hoid has had romantic interest in the past.
